title: Manohari Kundanalu: Emerald and Pearl Peacock Jhumkas
features: Exquisitely crafted peacock motifs form the core of these jhumkas. Featuring intricate filigree work and meticulously set CZ stones. The design incorporates a traditional temple design element at the top. The earrings feature pearl drops hanging from a floral structure at the bottom, adding movement and grace.
colors: Pearl (white). The contrast between the vibrant emeralds
and lustrous pearls creates a captivating aesthetic.
occasions: and special occasions. These jhumkas add a touch of traditional elegance to any outfit and are perfect for a half-saree function or grand family gathering.
description: These 'Manohari Kundanalu' are a testament to the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The combination of the sacred peacock motif, radiant emeralds, and lustrous pearls makes them a valuable heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability. A blend of traditional and modern aesthetics means these earrings complement both traditional and contemporary attire. The fine quality of the materials makes this a worthy investment.
